content: What commonality can be found among a dwelling, a vehicle, and two types of pets when they are combined into a concise phrase?

The commonality among a dwelling, a vehicle, and two types of pets could be encapsulated in the phrase "elements of daily life." These are all integral parts of many people's lives: a dwelling provides shelter, a vehicle offers transportation, and pets offer companionship. They each play a significant role in our day-to-day existence, contributing to our comfort, mobility, and emotional well-being.
